ComicInfo.Series: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong
ComicInfo.Summary: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong [Part 4]: With Superman near the death, Batman tries to determine where the monsters came from and how they can be sent back. On Skull Island, Green Arrow encounters King Kong and the League of Assassins. The Legion of Doom and other villains send Deathstroke and Cheetah to track down Toyman. Aquaman summons the League to Atlantis for help when Tiamat and Godzilla attack.
